casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John Lewis WRAY, Jr. No. 382P10-4. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Derrick Mertz, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. John L. Wray, Jr., Laurinburg, for Wray, John Lewis, Jr. Mike Miller, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd of December 2015 by Defendant to Vacate/Dismiss Conviction Based on Altered/Falsified Documents: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016." BEASLEY, J. recused.
